content: श्रुतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [श्रु-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Hearing; चंद्रस्य ग्रहणमिति श्रुतेः <ls>Mu. 1. 7</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 27.</ls> {@--2@} The ear; श्रुतिसुखभ्रमरस्वनगीतयः <ls>R. 9. 35</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Ve. 3. 23.</ls> {@--3@} Report, rumour, news, oral intelligence. {@--4@} A sound in general. {@--5@} The Veda (known by revelation, opp स्मृति; see under वेद). {@--6@} A Vedic or sacred text; इति श्रुतेः or इति श्रुतिः ‘so says a sacred text’ {@--7@} Vedic or sacred knowledge, holy learning. {@--8@} (In music) A division of the octavo, a quarter tone or interval; <ls>Śi. 1. 10</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">11. 1</ls>; (see <ls>Malli.</ls> {%ad loc.%}). {@--9@} The constellation Śravaṇa. {@--10@} The diagonal of a tetragon, the hypothenuse of a triangle; <ab>cf.</ab> कर्ण.
